directions:
Pre-heat oven to 250ºF.

Season ribs and put in oven covered with foil.

Bake until internal temperature reaches 190-203ºF - 3 - 5 hours.

Coat with BBQ sauce and broil for 3 min.

Flip, coat and broil again.

html.directions:
Pre-heat oven to 250ºF.

Season ribs and put in oven covered with foil.

Bake until internal temperature reaches 190-203ºF - 3 - 5 hours.

Coat with BBQ sauce and broil for 3 min.

Flip, coat and broil again.
html.ingredients:
Pork Spare Ribs

Homemade Pork Seasoning Rub

  1. ½ cup brown sugar
  2. ¼ cup smoked paprika
  3. 1 tbsp coarse ground black pepper
  4. 1 tbsp kosher salt
  5. 1 tbsp chili powder
  6. 1 tbsp garlic powder
  7. 1 tbsp onion powder
  8. 1 tsp cayenne

BBQ Sauce
